Method Detail

ejs.version Version(version: String)
Description
Create and parse a version Use valid() to test if the version string was a valid SemVer version.
copyFile(src: Path, dest: Path, options = expression)
Description
Copy a file. Copy files to a destination. The routine uses copy() to implement the copying. This either copies files or if generating, emits code to copy files.
Parameters
src: Path Source file.
dest: Path Destination.
options Options to pass to Me.copy(). These include user, group, uid, gid and permissions. [default: expression]
genTrace(tag: String, args: Array): Void
Description
Generate a trace line.
Parameters
tag: String Informational tag emitted before the message.
args: Array Message args to display.
linkFile(src: Path, dest: Path, options = expression)
Description
Link a file. This creates a symbolic link on systems that support symlinks. The routine uses Path.link() to implement the linking. This either links files or if generating, emits code to link files.
Parameters
src: Path Source file.
dest: Path Destination.
options See copy() for supported options. H. [default: expression]
makeDirectory(path: Path, options = expression)
Description
Make a directory This creates a directory and all required parents. This either makes a directory or if generating, emits code to make directories.
Parameters
path: Path Directory path to make.
options See copy() for supported options. H. [default: expression]
removeDir(path: Path, options = expression)
Description
Remove a directory. This removes a file or directory and all its contents include subdirectories. Use the 'empty' option to only remove empty directories. This either removes directories or if generating, emits code to remove directories.
Parameters
path: Path Directory to remove.
options Control options. [default: expression]
Options
emptyRemove the directory only if empty.
removeFile(path: Path, options = expression)
Description
Remove a file. This either removes files or if generating, emits code to remove files.
Parameters
path: Path File to remove.
options Control options. [default: expression]
removePath(path: Path)
Description
Remove a file or directory. This removes a file or directory and all its contents including subdirectories.
Parameters
path: Path File or directory to remove.
run(command, copt = expression): String
Description
Run a command and trace output if copt.show or options.show.
Parameters
command Command to run. May be an array of args or a string.
copt Options. These are also passed to Cmd. [default: expression]
Options
dirChange to given directory to run the command.
filterDo not display output to the console if it contains the specified filter pattern. Set to true to filter (not display) any output. Note the command always returns the command output as the function result.
generateGenerate in projects. Defaults to true.
noshowDo not show the command line before executing. Useful to override me --show for one command.
nostopContinue processing even if this command is not successful.
showShow the command line before executing. Similar to me --show, but operates on just this command.
timeoutTimeout for the command to complete Note: do not use the Cmd options: noio, detach. Use Cmd APIs directly.
safeCopy(from: Path, to: Path)
Description
Safely copy a file. This protects against overwriting the target unless the "overwrite" command line option was specified. Copies are traced to the console.
safeRemove(dir: Path)
Description
Safely remove a directory. This protects against removing some major system directories.
strace(tag, args: Array)
Description
Emit "show" trace This is trace that is displayed if me --show is invoked.
Parameters
tag Informational tag emitted before the message.
args: Array Message args to display.
embedthis.me.script touchDir(path: Path)
Description
Touch a directory and update its last modified time.
Parameters
path: Path Directory path to modify.
touchFile(path: Path)
Description
Touch a file and update its last modified time.
Parameters
path: Path File path to modify.
trace(tag: String, args: Array): Void
Description
Emit general trace.
Parameters
tag: String Informational tag emitted before the message.
args: Array Message args to display.
traceFile(msg, path): Void
Description
Emit trace for a path.
Parameters
msg Message to display.
path Filename to to trace.

Parameters
